to change the way something looks, is made, or works: The bank is redesigning its branches to make them colourful and contemporary.redesign sth to do sth Some publishers redesigned their publications to put a greater emphasis on lifestyle and entertainment stories.
the act or process of changing the way something looks, is made, or works: Changes and redesigns can be done quickly without much additional cost. We decided on a redesign of the company's entire operations process. The model is due for a major redesign.
